wyawasthawak pilibanda wa wiwidha parshawayangen wiwidhakara yojana idiripathwa athi namuth me wana thek kisidu awasan ketumpathak sakas kara nomathi bawada ebawin patu kona walin bala wiwidha asamagikam pathirawimata uthsaha nokala yuthu bawada kathanayaka waraya lesa thama katayuthu karana thek ratata janathawata budu dahamata ho wenath aagamakata sulu ho haniyak wana kisidu wyawasthawak gena eemata ida nothabana bawa da kathanayaka karu jayasuriya mahatha pawasiya.kathanayakawaraya me bawa sandahan kale ada perawaruwehi mirigama katholika dewasthana (japamala maniyange dewasthanaya) siyawas purnaya wenuwen pawathi samaru uthsawayehi pradhana aaradhithaya lesa sahabhagi wemini.mehidi thawaduratath kathanayaka waraya penwa dunne aandukrama wyawastha sampadaka mandalaye sabhapathiwaraya lesa parlimenthuwe sammatha kerena oonama wyawasthawak awasan washayen bala ganwenne swakiya athsanin bawath ehidi itha suparikshakariwa saha wagakimen katayuthu kirimata mulu mahath jathiyatama thama prathignya dena bawath ya.ebawin nawa aandukrama wyawasthawak pilibanda wa kisidu awasan ketumpathak idiripathwa nathi me awasthawe kalabala wima awashya nowana bawa da hethema sandahan kaleya.
